title: Hiragino font
content:
Hi  
I wish to use the Hiragino kaku gothic std for the website of the association i work for.  
I'm not sure about the license though.  
Does anybody know if I can use it? Or how to get the authorization?  
And if it's possible to use it, is it also possible to find a version for PC?  
Thanks!!
author: Lucie

comments.content:
You should ask [Dainippon Screen](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203225303/http:/www.screen.co.jp/ga_product/sento/index.html) about the license.  
Their address is sent-info[at]screen.co.jp.

Though I think you can use it for a website.

Of course, there is [a PC version](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203225303/http:/www.screen.co.jp/ga_product/sento/sample/hirg.html) of it, but I’m afraid they doesn’t ship it outside Japan.

Anyway you should ask them.

Or perhaps you might purchase it [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20120203225303/http:/font.multi-bits.com/ds/execute/FontSearch?encoding=Shift_JIS&locale=ja&tick=1197889825155&node=1197891692526&createOrder=false&searchType=1&orderBy=id&desc=false&knownTotal=0&offset=0&simString=&category=02&maker=4605&weight=0&type=01&platform=0&keyword=&simulation=0&saleType=1) by instant download.
